questions.question_text: When configuring email in Communication Channels, how many outgoing email addresses are supported?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Customer Service Management uses the Email Accounts application to create and maintain email accounts. The system administrator can create multiple incoming email addresses that customers can use to communicate with customer service agents. The system administrator can also create one outgoing email address.

https://www.servicenow.com/docs/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/c_CustomerServiceEmailCommunication.html

Selected Answer: A
Answer: A. One

Explanation: "The system administrator can also create one outgoing email address."

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/c_CustomerServiceEmailCommunication.html

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/c_CustomerServiceEmailCommunication.html

Selected Answer: A
A correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/c_CustomerServiceEmailCommunication.html

Selected Answer: A
https://www.servicenow.com/community/training-and-certifications/how-many-outgoing-email-addresses-are-supported-in-csm-for/m-p/363279

questions.question_text: In CSM Asset Management has a different meaning than in ITSM or Corporate Finance Which of the following defines Asset Management in CSM?

choices.A: The process of developing, operating, maintaining, upgrading, and disposing of assets in me most cost-effective manner
choices.C: Asset management has different use cases for tracking specific products or services customers are using
choices.D: It includes all of the data crucial to support customers as efficiently as possible
choices.B: A generic activity or process responsible for tracking and reporting the value and ownership of assets throughout their lifecycle

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
From the CSM fundamentals course :To Customer Service Management, asset management has different use cases for tracking products or services customers uses, or the assets the company uses to support customer-facing services.
The answer should be C

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
Correct answer is C

choices.C: A dashboard with specific visualization of the different knowledge bases and categories
choices.A: A bunch of tables strictly pertaining to CSM case articles that focus on mapping articles to Knowledge management
choices.B: A documented methodology to provide a set of best practices for creating and maintaining knowledge
choices.D: An application that helps agents and managers to create cases from Knowledge articles

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
I believe the correct answer should be B

Selected Answer: B
"B" is correct.

From the CSM Fundamentals e-book:

Knowledge-Centered Services (KCS) is a documented methodology providing a set of best practices for creating and maintaining knowledge. It focuses on knowledge as a key asset to the service provider in every customer interaction. The CSM Table Map [csm_table_map] creates a mapping between the case and knowledge article tables. The Create Knowledge feature uses the Case KCS Article table map by default. Administrators can modify this table map or create a new one. (...)

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-servicenow-platform/page/product/knowledge-management/concept/knowledge-centred-configuration.html#:~:text=Knowledge%2DCentered%20Service%20(KCS),KCS%20(V6)%20verified%20product.

The correct answer is B
pg326 fundamentals ebook

Selected Answer: ABE
The correct answer is A, B, E

Selected Answer: ABE
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-asset-management/page/product/product-catalog/concept/c_ModelCategories.html

Selected Answer: ABE
ABE is correct
ABE is correct

choices.E: Define a link between Asset classes and Configuration Item (CI) classes
choices.D: Model the configuration options for each product model being sold to customers
choices.A: Define whether a Configuration Item (CI) is created when an Asset record is created or vice versa
choices.C: Build a classification structure for product models

questions.question_text: When creating or importing assets for CSM, model categories are used to: (Choose three.)
